import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; import { LazyLoadImage } from 'react-lazy-load-image-component'; import 'react-lazy-load-image-component/src/effects/blur.css'; import { IntlProvider } from "react-intl"; import { API_ENDPOINT } from "../common/Constants"; import Loader from "../components/Loader"; import FolderChooser from "../components/cuverse/FolderChooser"; function CuLibraryPage() { let publicPath = process.env.PUBLIC_URL; let { id } = useParams(); const [projectLoading, setProjectLoading] = useState(false); const [project, setProject] = useState(null); async function fetchProjects() { setProjectLoading(true); try { const res = await axios.get(API_ENDPOINT + "projects/show/" + id); if (res.data.data) { setProjectLoading(false); setProject(res.data.data); } } catch (error) { console.error("error ", error); setProjectLoading(false); } } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); fetchProjects(); }, []); return (
